Description

The Achievement interface represents an achievement in the game.

Action
Functional interface that represents an action to be executed.
ActionMessage
Represents a message that contains an action to be executed.
AddToChatMessage
Message used to send a message to the chat.
AlreadyUsedPositionException
This exception is thrown when the user tries to place two cards on the same spot.
AvailableLobbiesMessage
Message used to send the available lobbies to the client.
Card
 
CardBack
 
CardInHandMessage
Message used to send the cards in the hand of the player.
CardNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when the card the user wants to draw from the board does not exist.
CatchPingMessage
Message used to notify the server that the client is still alive.
Chat
Chat class represents the chat of the game.
ChatMessage
Message used to send the chat message to the server, which will forward it to the receivers.
ClientInterface
Interface containing the methods the client can call.
ClientLauncher
 
Color
Enumeration of the colors of the game.
ColorChoiceSceneController
 
ColorRequestMessage
Message used to request the colors to the client.
ColorResponseMessage
Message used to send the color chosen by the player.
CommonCardUpdateMessage
Message used to update the common cards on the table.
Condition
Enumerates the possible conditions that a card can have to give points to the player.
Connection
This class is the abstract class that represents the connection between the server and the client.
ConnectionSceneController
 
Controller
 
Corner
 
CornerEnum
Enumerates the position of the possible corners of a card.
CornerState
Enumerates the possible states of a corner.
CostNotSatisfiedException
This exception is thrown when the user tries to place a gold card without fulfilling its cost.
DrawFromBoardMessage
Message used to notify the server that the player wants to draw a card from the board.
DrawMessage
Message used to notify the server that the player wants to draw from a deck
EmptyException
This exception is thrown when the user tries to draw from an empty deck.
ErrorMessage
Message used to send an error message to the client.
Face
 
FullHandException
This exception is thrown when the user draws a card already having 3 cards in his hand.
FullLobbyException
This exception is thrown when a user tries to join a lobby which is already full of players.
Game
 
GameBean
This class is a bean used to store the game state and the common resources, gold and achievements.
GameBoard
GameBoard class represents the board of the game.
GameNotStartedException
This exception is thrown when the game tries to end without starting.
GameState
Enumerates the possible states of the game.
GameStateMessage
Message used to send the game state to the client.
GenericController
 
GenericMessage
Message used to send a generic message to the client.
GoldCard
 
Gui
 
GuiInputHandler
 
GuiScenes
Enum that contains all the scenes of the game.
InvalidCoordinatesException
This exception is thrown when a player tries to place a card on a non-valid spot.
JsonFileNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when the JSON files necessary to run the game are not found
LobbiesSceneController
 
LobbyIndexMessage
Message used to send the index of the lobby chosen by the player.
LobbySizeSceneController
 
LoginResponseMessage
Message used to notify the server that the player wants to log in.
LoginSceneController
 
MainSceneController
 
Message
This class is the abstract class for all the messages that are exchanged between the server and the client.
MessageType
 
NotEnoughPlayersException
This exception is thrown when the game tries to start without being full.
NotInTurnException
This exception is thrown when a player tries to perform an action, such as place a card or draw one, without being in turn
NumPlayerRequestMessage
Message used to request the number of players of the lobby.
NumPlayerResponseMessage
Message used to send the server the size of the lobby the player wants to create.
Observable
Observable class represents the observable object of the observer pattern.
Observer
Observer interface represents the observer of the observer pattern.
OccupiedCornerException
This exception is thrown when a player tries to place a card on a corner which does not exist or that is already covered by another card.
OpponentsMessage
Message used to send his opponents to the client.
OtherPlayerBoardsSceneController
 
PingMessage
Message used to send a ping to the client.
PlaceMessage
Message used to notify the server that the player wants to place a card.
PlaceStarterRequestMessage
Message used to notify the server that the player wants to place his starter card.
Player
 
PlayerBean
This class is a bean used to store the player state and the player resources, hand and achievements.
PlayerBoard
PlayerBoard class represents the board of a player.
PlayerBoardUpdateMessage
Message sento to the client to update his board or one of his opponents.
PlayerNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when a player tries to send a message to another player who is not in the same lobby.
PlayerState
Enumerates the possible states of a player.
PlayerStateMessage
Message used to send the state of a player to the client.
ReconnectionMessage
Message notify the client of the updates that happened while he was disconnected.
ReconnectLobbyIndexMessage
Message used to request the server to reconnect to a specific lobby.
ReconnectSceneController
 
ResourceCard
 
RMIClient
This class is the client of the RMI connection.
RMIClientHandler
This interface is used to define the methods that the server can call on the client.
RMIConnection
This class represents the connection between the server and the client.
RMIServer
This class is the RMI server that handles the connection between the server and the client.
ScoreUpdateMessage
Message used to send the updated score of a player to the client.
Server
Server class is the main class of the server side of the application.
ServerAddressSceneController
 
ServerController
 
ServerLauncher
 
SetPrivateAchievementMessage
Message used to notify the server that the player wants to set his private achievement.
SocketClient
This class is used to handle the client side of the socket connection.
SocketConnection
This class represents the connection between the server and the client through a socket.
SocketServer
This class is responsible for creating a server socket and accepting incoming connections.
StarterCard
 
StarterCardMessage
Message used to send the starter card to the client.
StarterFlipSceneController
 
StartSceneController
 
Symbols
Enumerates the possible symbols that can be present on a card.
Tui
Class that represents the Text User Interface of the game.
TuiColors
Enumeration of colors for the TUI.
TuiCostants
Class that contains the constants used in the TUI.
TuiInputReaderTask
Class that reads the input from the user and sends them to a thread in the TUI.
TurnHandler
 
Ui
Interface containing the common methods for the UI.
UpdateCardMessage
Message used to update a card in the hand of the client.
UpdateDeckMessage
Message used to send the client an update on the deck.
UsernameRequestMessage
Message used to request a username to the client.
VirtualServer
This interface is used to define the methods that the client can call on the server.
WaitingReconnectionMessage
Message used to notify the client that the server is waiting for the reconnection of at least one player.
WinnerMessage
Message used to declare the winner(s) of the game.
WinnersSceneController
